title: my skins
body: i got gifted aatrox first skin that came with him and also his mecha skin, i was using them in game and 2 days after they were gone, i changed my name and im just wondering if its because of that or if it was a different reason.

replies.body: We'd like to help and take a look into this for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can see what's up.  We'll respond asap!
